name: Christmas Factory
description:
Your coal factory is killing Christmas and Santa isn't happy about it.

Christmas Factory is a tower-defense style game, with mechanics based on low temperatures. The game was developed in 3 days for the ACM Winter Game Jam 2022.

Winner of ACM Winter Game Jam 2022.

Your objective is to win 20 rounds, placing machines to defend yourself and END CHRISTMAS!

DEVELOPERS

- Programming  : João Pedro Mendes

- Art : Guilherme "Cobra" Antunes

- Game Designer : Eduardo "sayntseia" Chaves
